article.title: BAE Systems to Provide Situational Awareness Vehicles
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Operational Desert Storm Situational Awareness vehicle

article.text: BAE Systems, U.S. Combat Systems, York, Pennsylvania, was awarded a $270,825,641 cost-no-fee contract for the procurement of material for 245 Operational Desert Storm Situational Awareness vehicles. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Warren, Michigan, is the contracting activity.
